               int nodeId,
               java.util.GregorianCalendar earliestBound,
               java.util.GregorianCalendar latestBound)
        Add a delivery to the round
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client ID
        nodeId - The targeted node to deliver
        earliestBound - The earliest bound, the delivery cannot be delivered before
        latestBound - The latest bound, the delivery cannot be delivered after

                                  javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,

        Creates and returns a round from an XML file
        Parameters:

        network - The network containing every nodes
        Returns:
        a round created from the XML file
        Throws:
        UtilsException - If the parsing returns an exception
